p: The 2015 outbreak started on April 2nd (week 14 of 2015) and ended June 30th (week 27) involving 78 animals (Fig. 1). The herd size at the beginning of the outbreak was 2106. The incidence in 2015 was 3.7 (95% C.I. 3.0â€“4.6) cases per hundred animals per year (Additional file 1). The estimated direct losses to Kapiti Plains Ranch were estimated ~US$23,400.
